text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

text: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement.
author: Jess C. Scott

text: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
author: Denis Waitley

text: Keep your vitality. A life without health is like a river without water.
author: Maxime Lagacé

text: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
author: Hippocrates

text: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: A wise man should consider that health is the greatest of human blessings.
author: Hippocrates

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: When the heart is at ease, the body is healthy.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others from the overflow.
author: Eleanor Brown

text: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

text: A merry heart does good, like medicine, but a broken spirit dries the bones.

text: He who cures a disease may be the skillfullest, but he that prevents it is the safest physician.

text: Prevention is better than cure.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

text: Happiness is the highest form of health.

text: A good physician is the best prescription.
author: Unknown

text: Doctors put drugs of which they know little into bodies of which they know less for diseases of which they know nothing at all.
author: Voltaire

text: Eat to live, not live to eat.
author: Socrates

text: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

text: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
author: Jay Cutler

text: We do not stop exercising because we grow old—we grow old because we stop exercising.

author: Hippocrates

text: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
author: Ovid

text: Doctors diagnose, nurses heal, and caregivers make sense of it all.
author: Brett H. Lewis

text: Those who have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
author: Edward Stanley

text: Fasting is the first principle of medicine; fast and see the strength of the spirit reveal itself.

text: A sad soul can be just as lethal as a germ.
author: John Steinbeck

text: Every time you eat or drink, you are either feeding disease or fighting it.

author: Anonymous

text: Being healthy is a revolutionary act.

author: George Bernard Shaw

author: Albert Camus

author: Spanish Proverb

author: Proverbs 17:22

text: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Naomi Judd

text: If you think wellness is expensive, try illness.
author: Unknown

text: Your health is an investment, not an expense.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
author: Joyce Meyer
